lines.text: So what's the weather like in London?
Charter? No way. I want a scheduled flight.
You go back any way we think fit, Myers. The British government is paying for this.
Let me call my travel agent. Any extra expense is down to me. You can't say I haven't been cooperative. But I won't go back in any clapped out junk heap.

At first, the dollars were in small denominations, tens, fives, ones. But later, round November, on exchange day, I obtained samples of fifties and hundreds, two million dollars. You should use a deodorant.
Why do you refuse to see your wife?
